Articles.Content:
The F-134 Stealth Fighter is amazing (in my opinion) Built with nothing but the best quality parts and fastest thrusters you can get! This beast of a stealth fighter can take out the enemy before they even realise it's there! It tops out at a max speed of 220m/s (at about 2km high) and is VERY VERY VERY VERY stable, You can fly under the bridge at KSC with this thing! (this isn't even a VTOL!) I myself prefer to fly this in first person (It is actually easier in my opinion) around KSC.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

NOTE: The picture where its missing some wings and a control surface was right after a crash into the VAB.

Download: http://www./download/rwmdgbpn96u6mxd/F-134.craft

Edited November 21, 2014 by Kozak
Hey guys! Just checking in, I've noticed nobody's replied to this thread (not a problem, I just like it when people reply to my threads). Any reviews or wants for a new craft?

It is a good looking craft, but it isn't something I can use, and most likely wont work in FAR.

With that said, 220m/s is not that fast. It is about 2/3rds the speed of sound.
Ever thinking of doing an F-35. That's my favorite aircraft ever!

Ever thinking of doing an F-35. That's my favorite aircraft ever!

Never done a replica before, But i'll try!
